name: fiche
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
short form of
microfiche : a small, rectangular sheet of film on which information is photographed in a reduced size: You might provide your customer with typewritten extracts of a fiche. Copies of the module are available on fiche.
More examplesFewer examplesYou can see any part of the fiche on screen but cannot see the whole fiche at one time.If you obtain a fiche or hard copy of data, the item should be regarded as a piece of information rather than a tangible object.We have fiches of the current volume.The library also has readers for microfilm or fiche.
